name: Electro Abyss Mage
description:
Abyss creatures that utilize Electro in battles.
While studying at the Academia, researcher Alva Nikola once conducted a systematic study of the methods by which Electro Abyss Mage manipulate Electro and came up with a theoretical weapon known as the Nikola Coil. However, it has yet to be put into practice. Some say that his research materials were eaten during a fungal infestation.
